member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Tags.Aid.DefaultDynamicDataObjectList
member.summary:
Default Dynamic RejectionData Authentication RejectionData Object List
The DDOL is a list of data that the card requires if the DDA (Dynamic RejectionData Authentication of card and terminal data to verify that the card application and data are genuine.) method is used during RejectionData Authentication, and the terminal may also store a default DDOL that can be used if the DDOL is not present in the data from the card. The terminal uses the DOL processing rules to format the requested data and then sends it to the card in the Internal Authenticate command.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Tags.Aid.DefaultTransactionDataObjectList
member.summary: Default Transaction Certificate RejectionData Object List: The TDOL is a list of data that the terminal must use as the input when it needs to calculate a transaction cryptogram hash, and the terminal may also store a default TDOL that can be used if the TDOL is not present in the data from the card. The terminal uses the DOL (RejectionData Object List) processing rules to format the requested data, but this is only required if the transaction cryptogram hash is required by either of the CDOL.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Tags.Aid.Version

member.summary: Reset default value .

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Tags.Aid.ContactlessMode
member.summary: Contactless mode. Terminal capability to the referred AID, in case it's located in a CTLS: - "0": unsupported; - "1": support VISA MSD; ----- OBSOLET - "1" or "2": support VISA qVSDC; - "3": support MasterCard PayPass Magnetic Stripe; ----- OBSOLET - "3" or "4": support MasterCard PayPass M/Chip; - "5": support Amex Expresspay Magnetic Stripe Mode; ----- OBSOLET - "5" or "6": support Amex Expresspay EMV mode. - "7": support Pure Contactless. - "8" or "9": support Discover D-PASS EMV Mode.
